snippet.title: There is something wrong with this guy - The Restless point & Click Adventure Horror Game on Itch.io
snippet.description:
This game is dark, touches on dark topics and well.. its also very dark. I spent some time running around in circles because of how dark it was visually. 

Overall interesting game play and story, wish it was longer so that I could explore more of what was going on.

If you want to check it out, download "The Restless" free on Itch.io here: https://dansodic.itch.io/the-restless

Want more content? 
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcNfA8uPv0pLuFn2Ln9TJfw?sub_confirmation=1
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/subs/itspandabum

Check me out on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/itspandabum
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/itspandabum

#letsplay #indiehorror #dansodic
